response.original_title: The Poet H. Leivick in Palestine
response.overview: The poet H. Leivick visits Palestine, accompanied by an antourage, and meets Yaakov Zerubavel, a member of the Histadrut, the General Organization of Workers in Israel. Leivick enters the room where a formal event takes place and gives a speech while the guests are sitting at the table.
response.title: The Poet H. Leivick in Palestine
